Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Prohibits corrections employees from participating in degrading behavior towards incarcerated persons or fellow employees
Summary: Prohibits corrections employees from participating in degrading behavior towards incarcerated persons or fellow employees; establishes any individual who participates in such behavior shall be disciplined by the department and may have their employment terminated for cause.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to prohibiting corrections employees from participating in degrading behavior towards incarcerated persons or fellow employees
